Metadata.Title: Destroy Sessions When Users Log Out
Metadata.DirectLink: Destroy Sessions When Users Log Out

Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* Web Applications * Server-side
==What to Do==
Invalidate sessions when users log out.
==Why==
Invalidating sessions when users log out makes it harder to hijack them.
==How==
To invalidate sessions when users log out:
# **Identify logout functionality.** Find code that is responsible for the logout functionality. # **Add code to invalidate sessions.** Add code to the logout function to invalidate the session.
